aqua.gloss: a shade of blue tinged with green

aqua-lung.gloss: a device (trade name Aqua-Lung) that lets divers breathe under water

aqua fortis.gloss: acid used especially in the production of fertilizers and explosives and rocket fuels

aqua regia.gloss: a yellow fuming corrosive mixture of nitric and hydrochloric acid that dissolves metals (including gold)

aqualung.gloss: a device (trade name Aqua-Lung) that lets divers breathe under water

aquamarine.gloss: a shade of blue tinged with green

aquanaut.gloss: an underwater swimmer equipped with a face mask and foot fins and either a snorkel or an air cylinder
a skilled worker who can live in underwater installations and participate in scientific research

aquarium.gloss: a tank or pool or bowl filled with water for keeping live fish and underwater animals

aquarius.gloss: (astrology) a person who is born while the sun is in Aquarius
the eleventh sign of the zodiac

aquarius the water bearer.gloss: the eleventh sign of the zodiac

aquatic plant.gloss: a plant that grows partly or wholly in water whether rooted in the mud, as a lotus, or floating without anchorage, as the water hyacinth

aquatics.gloss: sports that involve bodies of water

aquavit.gloss: Scandinavian liquor usually flavored with caraway seeds

aqueductus cerebri.gloss: a canal connecting the third and fourth ventricles

aqueous humor.gloss: the limpid fluid within the eyeball between the cornea and the lens

aqueous humour.gloss: the limpid fluid within the eyeball between the cornea and the lens

aquiculture.gloss: a technique of growing plants (without soil) in water containing dissolved nutrients

aquila.gloss: the provincial capital of the Abruzzi region in central Italy

aquila chrysaetos.gloss: large eagle of mountainous regions of the northern hemisphere having a golden-brown head and neck

aquila degli abruzzi.gloss: the provincial capital of the Abruzzi region in central Italy

aquila rapax.gloss: brownish eagle of Africa and parts of Asia

aquilege.gloss: a plant of the genus Aquilegia having irregular showy spurred flowers

aquilegia.gloss: a plant of the genus Aquilegia having irregular showy spurred flowers

aquilegia caerulea.gloss: columbine of the Rocky Mountains having long-spurred blue flowers

aquilegia canadensis.gloss: columbine of eastern North America having long-spurred red flowers

aquilegia scopulorum calcarea.gloss: columbine of the Rocky Mountains having long-spurred blue flowers

aquilegia vulgaris.gloss: common European columbine having variously colored (white or blue to purple or red) short-spurred flowers

aquinas.gloss: (Roman Catholic Church) Italian theologian and Doctor of the Church who is remembered for his attempt to reconcile faith and reason in a comprehensive theology

aquitaine.gloss: a region of southwestern France between Bordeaux and the Pyrenees

aquitania.gloss: a region of southwestern France between Bordeaux and the Pyrenees

aqueous.gloss: produced by the action of water

aquiline.gloss: curved down like an eagle's beak
